Data::Perl::Role::Bool(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Data::Perl::Role::Bool(3)

NAME

Data::Perl::Role::Bool - Wrapping class for boolean values.

VERSION

version 0.002011

SYNOPSIS

  use Data::Perl qw/bool/;
  my $bool = bool(0);
  $bool->toggle; # 1
  $bool->unset; # 0

DESCRIPTION

This class provides a wrapper and methods for interacting with boolean values.

PROVIDED METHODS

None of these methods accept arguments.

new($value)
Constructs a new Data::Perl::Collection::Bool object initialized with the passed in value, and returns it.
set
Sets the value to 1 and returns 1.
unset
Set the value to 0 and returns 0.
toggle
Toggles the value. If it's true, set to false, and vice versa.

Returns the new value.

not
Equivalent of 'not $value'.

SEE ALSO

  • Data::Perl
  • MooX::HandlesVia
